org.apache.archiva.repository

Class AbstractRemoteRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractRepository
      • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractRemoteRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableRemoteRepository, EditableRepository, RemoteRepository, Repository, RepositoryEventHandler, RepositoryEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicRemoteRepository, MavenRemoteRepository

    public abstract class AbstractRemoteRepository
extends AbstractRepository
implements EditableRemoteRepository
    Abstract implementation of a remote repository. Abstract classes must implement the features and capabilities by themselves.
